actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to renew the temporary reduction of duty on staple fibers of viscose rayon, not carded, combed, or otherwise processed for spinning.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the reduction of duty on staple fibers of viscose rayon, not carded, combed, or otherwise processed for spinning.

titles.title: A bill to renew the temporary reduction of duty on staple fibers of viscose rayon, not carded, combed, or otherwise processed for spinning.
